short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customizes the Bush's Instagram profile page for use on Bush's Visitor Center digital signs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When active, the page at https://www.instagram.com/bushsbeans/ will be modified with injected CSS and JS to tailor the page for use on touch screen digital signage in the Bush's visitor center. Other instagram profiles and pages will be unaffected.
